meanings.definition: The quality of being made by hand.
meanings.sent1: Her handcraftsmanships were evident in the intricate details of the wooden carvings.
meanings.sent2: The artist's handcraftsmanships were admired by all who saw her work.
meanings.sent3: The handcraftsmanships of the chef were so good that even the pickiest eater was impressed.
meanings.sent4: The handcraftsmanships of the tailor stitched together a masterpiece of a dress.
meanings.sent5: The handcraftsmanships of the potter transformed clay into beautiful pottery.

meanings.definition: The skill of making things by hand.
meanings.sent1: His handcraftsmanships in woodworking were unmatched in the village.
meanings.sent2: Learning handcraftsmanships like knitting can be a relaxing hobby.
meanings.sent3: The handcraftsmanships of the young carpenter improved with each project he completed.
meanings.sent4: Her handcraftsmanships in painting were like magic on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The handcraftsmanships of the blacksmith forged strong and durable tools.

meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various handcraftsmanships from local artisans.
meanings.sent2: Collectors appreciate the unique handcraftsmanships found in antique markets.
meanings.sent3: The handcraftsmanships on sale at the fair attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent4: The handcraftsmanships of the weaver were sought after for their quality.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition showcased the diverse handcraftsmanships of different cultures.
